p: Kounis syndrome is an acute coronary syndrome caused by mast cell and platelet activation induced by allergic reactions. At present, the diagnosis of Kounis syndrome is still based on the clinical manifestations and medical history of patients, and many cases may be missed or underdiagnosed. Although Kounis syndrome is rare, some triggers have been gradually reported, including drugs, medical conditions, and environmental exposures ( 1). Here, we report a case of Kounis syndrome induced by phloroglucinol.
